task.title: Healthy Berry Yogurt Smoothie for Armando
task.shortdesc: For this Recipe, Armando will need the follwing: ¾ cup fresh blueberries, ¾ cup fresh blackberries, 5.3 ounce package plain greek yogurt, 1 cup vanilla soy milk, 1 whole banana

step.cmd: Add all of the ingredients into our blender
Pulse for 30 seconds. If too thick add splashes of soy milk to even out mixture.
Pour into a large tumbler or glass and enjoy!
